programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou III
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. Petersson"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
programme.desc: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Götz George, Uschi Glas. On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061197/","name":"Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M2YTUwNzctNDM5OC00Njk4LWJiMmQtODAyMzkwNjM0YjI4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's prote","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061197/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Karl May the 8th","reviewBody":"I did not know how many films were made prior to this (based on Karl Mays novels), but another reviewer seems to be on top of that. And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. And that can only be a testament of the novels they were based on - which obviously I haven't read - shame on me.\n\nIt is nice to see the usual suspect reprise their leading roles, but also have some other known German (and other European) actors being added here. I just realize that I never talked about the "native American" language that they use in these movies ... I have no idea on what that is based on ... but it does not sound as if they are mocking the people speaking them. Generally speaking you can feel that there is love for the native Americans. It is nice to see a morally "right" view on things ... or at least a not one sided "white man" approach and outlook on them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1966-08-19","keywords":"spaghetti western,italo western,films about indians,american indian,woman saloon owner","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061197/","name":"Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M2YTUwNzctNDM5OC00Njk4LWJiMmQtODAyMzkwNjM0YjI4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's prote","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061197/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp","dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Karl May the 8th","reviewBody":"I did not know how many films were made prior to this (based on Karl Mays novels), but another reviewer seems to be on top of that. And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou I
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"],"duration":"PT1H29M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Unter Geiern
Unter Geiern
programme.desc: Unter Geiern: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Pierre Brice, Götz George, Elke Sommer, Stewart Granger. Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058709/","name":"Unter Geiern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJkZTA3ZDgtMzViMS00YzY3LWFhZTMtZTdlZDM0ZDYxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058709/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Film","reviewBody":"Thought I might be interested in this film because I like the acting of Stewart Granger over the years and in this so called film he plays the role of a so called superman named "Old Surehand" which is a big joke. The acting is horrible and you will be completely confused as to what is really going on between Indians and white people. This film should be called a comedy film because the entire film goes around in circle after circle and makes absolutely no sense at all. Elke Sommer, (Annie Dillman) was added to the film to give some romantic charm to the film but her acting and performance was a big waste of time. I wish I had never seen this film, it is a HORRIBLE FILM!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"keywords":"buxom,apache indian,arizona territory,apache territory,bigotry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813961/","name":"Elke Sommer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017157/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045465/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796242/","name":"Johanna Sibelius"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi
programme.desc: Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Götz George, Uschi Glas. On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's protection." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0061197/","name":"Winnetou und das Halbblut Apanatschi","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2M2YTUwNzctNDM5OC00Njk4LWJiMmQtODAyMzkwNjM0YjI4L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTM3MDMyMDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"On her b-day, settler's daughter Apanatschi receives her father's secret gold mine but greedy neighboring prospectors resort to murder and kidnapping in order to get the gold, forcing the girl and her brother to seek Winnetou's prote","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0061197/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Karl May the 8th","reviewBody":"I did not know how many films were made prior to this (based on Karl Mays novels), but another reviewer seems to be on top of that. And while I haven't seen them all (or rather rewatched, because I loved them as a kid), I can say that it is an endearing and lovely series of films that were made. And that can only be a testament of the novels they were based on - which obviously I haven't read - shame on me.\n\nIt is nice to see the usual suspect reprise their leading roles, but also have some other known German (and other European) actors being added here. I just realize that I never talked about the "native American" language that they use in these movies ... I have no idea on what that is based on ... but it does not sound as if they are mocking the people speaking them. Generally speaking you can feel that there is love for the native Americans. It is nice to see a morally "right" view on things ... or at least a not one sided "white man" approach and outlook on them.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"datePublished":"1966-08-19","keywords":"spaghetti western,italo western,films about indians,american indian,woman saloon owner","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou III
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. programme.title: Der Ölprinz
Der Ölprinz
programme.desc: Der Ölprinz: Directed by Harald Philipp. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Harald Leipnitz, Macha Méril. Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059958/","name":"Der Ölprinz","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmY4NDdjMTItZThmNC00OGUzLTg1YTUtY2I4OTk5NWU2YWE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Apache Chief Winnetou and scout Old Surehand team-up to assist a wagon-train of settlers who are threatened by the machinations of an unscrupulous crook known as the Oil Prince.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059958/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dcnilsen54"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolute Drivel","reviewBody":"I must admit I am not really a fan of foreign westerns- and as an American- why should I be!? ..but this one really takes the cake- I could not even finish watching this rotten tomato...totally fake voices, poor audio dubbing, actors that are the fakest excuse for Indians I have ever seen..an almost blatant disregard for a coherent plot..constant injections of idiotic scenes which have little or nothing to do with the story...lousy script, terrible actors..just FAKE, FAKE , FAKE in every respect...how I made it through an entire hour I do not know..How in the world these other people can give this movie a good review is beyond me- but it just goes to show that the vast majority of these reviews are from people who would not know a good movie if it walked up behind them and bit them in the gluteus maximus","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1342,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,apache,settler,arizona,arizona territory","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0500505/","name":"Harald Leipnitz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0679974/","name":"Harald Philipp"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Old Surehand
Old Surehand
programme.desc: Old Surehand: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Stewart Granger, Pierre Brice, Larry Pennell, Letícia Román. Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0059538/","name":"Old Surehand","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjFiYjdiODQtZWMyNy00Y2MyLWEyN2ItMTRjNDA1OTZiYmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxOTQ0MA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Old Surehand and Old Wabble are trailing a killer, but on the way they also intervene in a dispute between the Comanche and the settlers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0059538/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2007-07-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling and touching story about Old Surehand and Winnetou , well performed by Granger and Brice","reviewBody":"This is a highly entertaining film based on Karl May trilogy novels , it starts with Old Surehand ( Stewart Granger ) in an exciting opening sequence when he rides onto the screen and soon rescues to train passengers attacked by bandits . After that , the outlaws killing American buffalo for originating a war against white-men . Later on , Indians raid a ranch , the Indian chief's son comes to the little town for a peace treatise but he's treacherously murdered . Meanwhile , Old Sureland befriends an old man ad his nephew ( Letitia Milan who played the first Mario Bava's Giallo: ¨Girl who knew too much¨ ) and his fiancé , a judge assistant ( Terence Hill or Mario Girotti, previous his successful Trinity ). There's an emotional love story between them , and they are taken prisoners by Indians . Sureland set on pursuit of his killer's brother and attempts to pacify the Indians . Of course , he encounters his Indian-brother Winnetou ( Pierre Brice ) at an emotional meeting . The clues lead a gunrunner named the General ( Larry Pennell ).\n\nThis is an agreeable episode about one of the series of popular German made Western , featuring the duo formed by valiant ¨Old Surehand¨ and immortal ¨Winnetou¨ , they repeat their same noted roles as dignified as always . This enjoyable saga benefits from sensational adventures , shootouts , larger-than-life characters and spectacular scenarios shot in Yugoslavia . Stewart Granger took the role in two occasions ( ¨Among vultures¨ and this one ) and Pierre Brice starred all the series and he went on filming television episodes . Chemistry between them is quite match , Stewart Granger scores especially high marks , he plays with mirth and liking manner . His predecessor was the serious Lex Barker who starred a diverse character but the roles are pretty similar , he played the most part of series : ¨Apache gold(1963)¨ by Harald Reinl, ¨Apaches last Battle(1964)¨ by Hugo Fregonese, ¨Last of renegades(1964)¨, ¨The desperate trail¨, ¨Old Shatterland(1966)¨ by Harald Philipp, ¨In the valley of death(1968)¨ by Harald Reinl , besides Rod Cameron starred only one : ¨Old Firehand¨ directed by Alfred Vohrer. The film displays a colorful cinematography and a catching musical score by usual series , Martin Bottcher . The motion picture produced by Rialto Productions is convincingly directed by Alfred Vohrer who directed various Karl May titles , besides he was a German thriller expert called Krimi ( Edward Wallace adaptation ) .","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"datePublished":"1965-12-14","keywords":"buffalo herd,male female relationship,barroom brawl,reprisal,vindication","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001289/","name":"Stewart Granger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672074/","name":"Larry Pennell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219043/","name":"Fred Denger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Winnetou
Winnetou I
programme.desc: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986"},"dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. IMDb data; ttnr: 0057687, Title: Winnetou, --- Description: Winnetou - 1. Teil: Directed by Harald Reinl. With Lex Barker, Pierre Brice, Marie Versini, Mario Adorf. When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0057687/","name":"Winnetou - 1. Teil","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWUxMmIxMDItY2RjYi00YmU5LTgyYmUtZWVjYjFjOTA2MzhmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk5NDcxODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"When violent conflict breaks out between greedy railroaders and a tribe of Mescalero Apaches, only two men, destined to be blood brothers, can prevent all-out war: chief's son Winnetou and German engineer Old Shatterhand.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0057687/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"gurdia1986","dateCreated":"2010-06-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"The 2nd from the best movies about Winnetou","reviewBody":"To my mind, "Winnetou I" is the second from the best movies about Winnetou after "Old Shatterhand" ("Apache's last battle"). These movies are different. "Winnetou I" or "Apache's gold" is very romantic, a nice fairy-tale about noble and human Indian and his blood brother. It's idealized story, far from cruel reality. "Old Shatterhand" has some similar features, but it is more realistic. However, I can see both these movies after 40 or 35 years with pleasure despite of the naiveness of both these films as examples of excellent cinema art reminding me about ideals of childhood and youth. Director Harald Reinl is a great master of romantic cinema. This movie is very beautiful with a great deal of poetic. A beauty of nature (filmed in Croatia) is a background for romantic drama. Two contrasting actors - Pierre Brice (Winnetou) and Lex Barker (Shatterhand) - looks excellent together. To my mind, this is the best Barker's movie: he acts with true passion. Unfortunately, he lost it in last Winnetou's movies.. Pierre Brice is very intelligent actor with a good taste and wit some mystery in his noble face. This mystery makes him very attractive. Marie Versini's Nscho-tschi is the best Indian woman I see in the European westerns. He looks excellent alongside Pierre Brice and his acting is touching. Mario Adorf is very strong as villain Santer, Ralf Wolter's comical characterisation is also very good. And music (Martin Boettcher) is very beautiful. .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"genre":["Western","Adventure"],"keywords":"apache territory,spaghetti western,italo western,opening action scene,violence","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000851/","name":"Lex Barker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0894949/","name":"Marie Versini"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718243/","name":"Harald Reinl"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063537/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023529/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102259/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0677457/","name":"Harald G. programme.title: Unter Geiern
Unter Geiern
programme.desc: Unter Geiern: Directed by Alfred Vohrer. With Pierre Brice, Götz George, Elke Sommer, Stewart Granger. Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0058709/","name":"Unter Geiern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJkZTA3ZDgtMzViMS00YzY3LWFhZTMtZTdlZDM0ZDYxMjMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA4ODc3ODU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Outlaws disguised as Indians commit crimes against settlers but Winnetou and Old Surehand are determined to unmask the bandits and keep the peace between settlers and Indians.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0058709/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"whpratt1"},"dateCreated":"2008-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horrible Film","reviewBody":"Thought I might be interested in this film because I like the acting of Stewart Granger over the years and in this so called film he plays the role of a so called superman named "Old Surehand" which is a big joke. The acting is horrible and you will be completely confused as to what is really going on between Indians and white people. This film should be called a comedy film because the entire film goes around in circle after circle and makes absolutely no sense at all. Elke Sommer, (Annie Dillman) was added to the film to give some romantic charm to the film but her acting and performance was a big waste of time. I wish I had never seen this film, it is a HORRIBLE FILM!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1549,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"Approved","genre":["Adventure","Western"],"keywords":"buxom,apache indian,arizona territory,apache territory,bigotry","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0108523/","name":"Pierre Brice"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313443/","name":"Götz George"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0813961/","name":"Elke Sommer"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0901138/","name":"Alfred Vohrer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043072/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017157/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0045465/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562015/","name":"Karl May"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0445123/","name":"Eberhard Keindorff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0796242/","name":"Johanna Sibelius"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0408381, Title: Doc Martin, --- Description: Doc Martin: Created by Dominic Minghella, Mark Crowdy, Craig Ferguson. With Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Ian McNeice, Joe Absolom. The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0408381/","name":"Doc Martin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmMTAxZTAtNzNhZS00MThhLWJmMmEtYWExZGUzODkxMmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"justimarie","dateCreated":"2006-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a gem","reviewBody":"This gem of a series is lifted out of the sickly-sweet genre of medic/policeman in small quirky country community (often with 'heart' somewhere in the title and 'heartwarming' in the reviews - ugh!) by the spectacular social ineptness of the lead character, Doc Martin, perfectly played by Martin Clunes. Imagine the series if Doc Martin was an ordinary GP, and you'll see what I mean. I was first attracted by the wonderful scenery of Port Isaac in Cornwall (Port Wen in the series)but quickly got interested in how he was going to put his foot in it this week. The story lines are average I would say, some better than others, usually centred on a different medical incident each week, but the real interest is in the relationships between the villagers and the doctor, and how they develop over time. It is always entertaining (and even the not-so-good plot lines are enlivened by the beautiful landscape) and sometimes extremely funny - something to look forward to.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14530,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-09-02","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167340/","name":"Martin Clunes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146414/","name":"Caroline Catz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573862/","name":"Ian McNeice"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103911/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136637/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591286/","name":"Dominic Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: The Rookie: Created by Alexi Hawley. With Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Melissa O'Neil. Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7587890/","name":"The Rookie","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTY5OWFmMzAtZTIxYi00NGM4LTk3YWMtY2MyYzMwOWVhZWM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0408381, Title: Doc Martin, --- Description: Doc Martin: Created by Dominic Minghella, Mark Crowdy, Craig Ferguson. With Martin Clunes, Caroline Catz, Ian McNeice, Joe Absolom. The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0408381/","name":"Doc Martin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNmMTAxZTAtNzNhZS00MThhLWJmMmEtYWExZGUzODkxMmM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"justimarie","dateCreated":"2006-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"What a gem","reviewBody":"This gem of a series is lifted out of the sickly-sweet genre of medic/policeman in small quirky country community (often with 'heart' somewhere in the title and 'heartwarming' in the reviews - ugh!) by the spectacular social ineptness of the lead character, Doc Martin, perfectly played by Martin Clunes. Imagine the series if Doc Martin was an ordinary GP, and you'll see what I mean. I was first attracted by the wonderful scenery of Port Isaac in Cornwall (Port Wen in the series)but quickly got interested in how he was going to put his foot in it this week. The story lines are average I would say, some better than others, usually centred on a different medical incident each week, but the real interest is in the relationships between the villagers and the doctor, and how they develop over time. It is always entertaining (and even the not-so-good plot lines are enlivened by the beautiful landscape) and sometimes extremely funny - something to look forward to.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14530,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2004-09-02","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167340/","name":"Martin Clunes","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0146414/","name":"Caroline Catz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573862/","name":"Ian McNeice"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103911/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136637/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0591286/","name":"Dominic Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTViMDJlYzEtOTUxNi00ZTU5LWI5MTYtMGViNTQ4NTVkYTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"babyk-44846","dateCreated":"2017-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Amazed with this show","reviewBody":"I, for one.... can not Believe the reviews I have read. It is totally unfathomable that people have such narrow minds. First off. It is a television show. Nothing more People! It is a refreshing insight to all that autistic children, adults face on a daily basis. It is thoughts of what is possible for ANYONE with any type of disability they may face to have a positive outlook for what they stand for and fight for at any given time in their life. Although, it is extreme... It is the possibility that something greater can happen in the life of someone with disabilities no matter how great or small. I find a learning experience in every episode I have watched and that is to learn more about autism from every aspect and have compassion enough to care ... as a human being. I would be very sad if this show doesn't continue and show it's full potential. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 6470478, Title: The Good Doctor, --- Description: The Good Doctor: Created by David Shore. With Freddie Highmore, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Antonia Thomas. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6470478/","name":"The Good Doctor","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTViMDJlYzEtOTUxNi00ZTU5LWI5MTYtMGViNTQ4NTVkYTMyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzAzNTY3MDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and Savant syndrome, is recruited into the surgical unit of a prestigious hospital.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6470478/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"babyk-44846","dateCreated":"2017-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Amazed with this show","reviewBody":"I, for one.... can not Believe the reviews I have read. It is totally unfathomable that people have such narrow minds. First off. It is a television show. Nothing more People! It is a refreshing insight to all that autistic children, adults face on a daily basis. It is thoughts of what is possible for ANYONE with any type of disability they may face to have a positive outlook for what they stand for and fight for at any given time in their life. Although, it is extreme... It is the possibility that something greater can happen in the life of someone with disabilities no matter how great or small. I find a learning experience in every episode I have watched and that is to learn more about autism from every aspect and have compassion enough to care ... as a human being. I would be very sad if this show doesn't continue and show it's full potential. I will be forever watching as long as it is aired!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":83102,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-09-25","keywords":"autism,surgeon,based on tv series,three word series title,san francisco california","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0383603/","name":"Freddie Highmore","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004991/","name":"Hill Harper","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0771493/","name":"Richard Schiff"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0483675/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209226/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466990/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0794914/","name":"David Shore"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 5 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2327495449","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzYyY2ZkNWMtOTRjZS00OGQ4LWE1OTUtNzVjODM1YWY5NGRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzYyY2ZkNWMtOTRjZS00OGQ4LWE1OTUtNzVjODM1YWY5NGRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"With new beginnings come new challenges. Not only is it a Canadian production, but it is set in Canada - the first is not unusual, the second is, yet I see a rise in the confidence that good productions, once proven, will be picked up by American and even International broadcasters, which will allow our productions to earn their keep. Based on this premiere, I give this series an 8 (great) out of 10. programme.title: Mariage à l'anglaise
programme.desc: Depuis qu’ils se sont rencontrés dans une soirée, Nat, jeune femme ambitieuse, et Josh, apprenti romancier, nagent dans le bonheur, malgré leurs différences. Car si Josh est plutôt du genre intellectuel, Nat est une fonceuse. Ce qui ne les a pas empêchés d’être réunis par un coup de foudre réciproque. Leur mariage est idyllique, même si personne de leurs proches à leurs amis, jusqu’au pasteur qui officie, ne croit qu’il pourra durer… Surtout quand l’ex-petite amie de Josh, Chloe, et le charmant client américain de Nat, Guy, s’en mêlent.

programme.title: Comment se faire larguer en 10 leçons
programme.desc: Andie, une journaliste, doit livrer un compte-rendu personnel sur tout ce qui peut faire échouer une histoire d'amour. Elle a dix jours pour séduire un homme, puis accumuler toutes les gaffes possibles qui le feront fuir. La journaliste jette son dévolu sur Benjamin, un publicitaire, sans se douter que celui-ci a fait le pari inverse : il veut séduire Andie et la rendre, en dix jours, follement amoureuse de lui.
